Articles.Content:
Yes, I did a test run on a copy with 1.5 with all my mods - as updated as possible.

Something weird:

The CoM on many parts is moved - most obviously the CoM of a BDB Gemini pod is moved upwards, so it's unstable during reentry and flips eventually when the dynamic pressure reaches a specific value (at about 50 km altitude on Earth/RSS).

That thing never flipped before.

So, can a mod incompatibility make the CoM move?
Does that make sense?
